Articles.Content:
Does anyone still have the source for this mod?

It has been outdated for ages, the original modder last said they were having problems with some parts of the UI that had changed between KSP versions, then kinda abandoned the thread to be locked. License is MIT, but the links to the source are dead...

Hi, I was going to send you a PM but I might as well post this here. The source isn't dead, it was just renamed to something that rolled off the tongue a bit better when I was last working on it. It probably won't be much help because it predates the migration to the new Unity GUI. That's actually a good thing in this case though because the new Unity UI is much more modder friendly than the old EzGUI stuff was
Thanks! I understand there were like some two or three major changes in the game code since, but at least it's a start!
